web_snippets: Shannon Watts is a mother of five who, prior to founding Moms Demand Action, was a stay-at-home mom and former communications executive.
Barbara Boxer Fellow Shannon Watts is the founder of Moms Demand Action, the nation's largest grassroots group fighting against gun violence.
